name: Letters Home
description:
War isn’t Hell. War is war, and Hell is Hell. And of the two, war is a lot worse.” – Hawkeye, M*A*S*H 

Letters Home is a game about the losses of World War 1. You play as a soldier in the trenches who must deliver a letter to the end of the trench, however, you can die at any time and you are sure to witness atrocities. Upon death the player is able to  read actual letters received from soldiers during WWI.
